Excel color palette (discrete)

Source: R/excel.R
excel_classic_pal.Rd

The color palettes used in Microsoft Excel 1997 (up until Excel 2007). Use this for that classic ugly look and feel. For ironic purposes only. 3D bars and pies not included. Please never use this color palette.

excel_classic_pal(line = TRUE)

Arguments

line

If TRUE, use the palette for lines and points. Else, use the palette for area.

See also

Other colour excel: excel_pal, scale_color_excel_classic, scale_fill_excel_classic

Examples

library("scales")

show_col(excel_classic_pal()(7))
show_col(excel_classic_pal(line = FALSE)(7))
